home.title: Don’t hesitate any longer, we’re thinking for you!
home.encarttext1: Being safe in your accommodation, having a reliable owner or tenant is essential for us.
home.encarttext2: Making the search and rental of lodgings simple and accessible to all is essential to us.
home.encarttext3: We strive to verify our users to be welcoming, trustworthy and reliable.

home.accroche2: Discover sublime landscapes by going on a trip to unusual, welcoming and warm lodgings.

footer.accroche: Look no further, we Co'Gîtons for you
